value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01

value.title: Build serverless APIs with Azure Functions | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can build highly scalable serverless APIs with Azure Functions.  0:00 – Overview 1:09 – What "serverless" really means 4:00 – A closer look at Azure Functions 7:29 – Azure Functions Live Metrics 10:45 – Thinking downstream of Azure Functions 13:52 – Using

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for

value.title: How to host a static website with Azure Storage | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how you can host a static website running in Azure Storage in a few steps.     For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure:

value.title: How to quickly connect to Windows VMs using RDP | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to Windows Virtual Machines (VMs) with Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). Watch how easy and fast it is to connect to your virtual machines in Azure.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/  Get started with 12
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RXS9F7yy4A8" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to use Azure Automation with PowerShell | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Automation with a Windows Machine with PowerShell. Azure Automation makes it easy to do common tasks like, scaling Azure SQL Database up and down and starting and stopping a virtual machine.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesize text input to speech, perform speech translation, and implement speaker recognition in your AI infused applications

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Configure security policies to manage data
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

value.title: Connect to virtual machines through the Azure portal by using Azure Bastion
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Bastion to securely connect to Azure Virtual Machines directly within the Azure portal.

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.title: Create security baselines
value.excerpt: Create security baselines

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools
value.excerpt: Find out how to develop an Azure Function in Visual Studio with a test framework to create, deploy, and test this scalable and secure service.

value.title: Improve application scalability and resiliency by using Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to use Azure Load Balancer to distribute traffic between multiple virtual servers or services.

value.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
value.excerpt: Learn about SRE, an engineering discipline that helps you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

value.title: Secure administrator accounts in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

value.title: Monitor performance of virtual machines by using Azure Monitor for VMs
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Monitor for VMs to monitor your organization's Azure virtual machines.

value.title: Protect your APIs on Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Protect your back-end APIs from information exposure and implement throttling to prevent resource exhaustion with policies in Azure API Management.

value.title: Protect your identities with Azure AD Identity Protection
value.excerpt: Use the advanced detection and remediation of identity-based threats to protect your Azure Active Directory identities and applications from compromise.

value.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.title: Provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location
value.excerpt: Learn how to provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location.

value.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure App Service to create a new ASP.NET-based web app, then publish and update directly from Visual Studio.

value.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

value.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.
